sen.j: 尾上 多見蔵（おのえ たみぞう）は、歌舞伎役者の名跡。
sen.e: "Tamizo ONOE" is a professional name which was used by some Kabuki (a traditional form of drama and music performed by male actors) actors.
"Tamizo ONOE" is a professional name which was used by some Kabuki (a traditional form of drama and music performed by male actors) actors.
"Tamizo ONOE" is a professional name which was used by some Kabuki (a traditional form of drama and music performed by male actors) actors.
His haimyo (a kabuki actor's offstage name which can be used both officially and privately) was Kocho (幸朝).
sen.cmt: 「幸朝」の正式な読み方が不明です。
sen.e: His haimyo (a Kabuki actor's offstage name which can be used both officially and privately) was Kocho (幸朝).
His haimyo (a Kabuki actor's offstage name which can be used both officially and privately) was Kocho (幸朝).
His yago (stage family names) were Aizu-ya and Otowa-ya.
His yago (stage family names) were Aizu-ya and Otowa-ya.

sen.j: - 俳名、二朝、松玉、松朝、雅号、春風舎。
sen.e: His haimyo were Nicho (二朝), Shogyoku (松玉), Shocho(松朝), Gago, and Shunpusha (春風舎).
sen.cmt: 二朝、松玉、松朝、春風舎の正式な読み方がそれぞれ不明です。
sen.e: His haimyo were Nicho (二朝), Shogyoku (松玉), Shocho(松朝), Gago, and Shunpusha (春風舎).
His haimyo were Nicho (二朝), Shogyoku (松玉), Shocho(松朝), Gago, and Shunpusha (春風舎).

sen.j: - 俳名、梅笑、屋号は音羽屋
sen.e: His haimyo was Baisho (梅笑) and his yago was Otowa-ya.
sen.cmt: 「梅笑」の正式な読み方が不明です。
